duties_responsibilities.duty: Support professional staff in the coordination and completion of non-clinical functions.
Communicate effectively with team members regarding patient information, messages, and medical documentation.
Maintain Electronic Medical Records and facilitate smooth operation of the unit.
Participate in Revenue Management, ensuring accuracy of documenting services and supplies provided to patients.
Maintain Device Maintenance by charging/ storing devices, coordinating repairs, and performing basic troubleshooting techniques on computer devices.
Serve as a liaison between patients, families, and professional staff, ensuring appropriate processing and preparing patient charts for transfers to other units.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required. Advanced classes in Medical Terminology and Anatomy preferred.
